Yen sinks as currency traders keep short and carry onThe yen sagged to fresh lows on the euro, sterling and other crosses this week and headed for a fourth weekly drop on the dollar as investors chased better yields just about everywhere but Japan, wagering rates there would stay near zero for some time. Volvo Cars proposes to distribute 62.7% Polestar stake to shareholdersVolvo Cars said on Friday it plans to distribute 62.7% of its stake worth 9.5 billion Swedish crowns ($920.17 million) in Polestar Automotive Holding to its own shareholders.
